name: JellyFetch
description: Downloads web videos using yt-dlp via a simple web interface.
overview: JellyFetch is a Jellyfin plugin that allows you to easily download videos from various websites using the powerful yt-dlp command-line tool.  It provides a user-friendly web interface for submitting video URLs, and integrates the downloads seamlessly into your Jellyfin library.

versions.changelog:
Initial release.
- Added ability to download videos using yt-dlp.
- Provides a web interface for submitting URLs.
- Configurable download path.
- Uses Jellyfin's API Key authentication.
